original_title: Chonda Pierce - A Piece Of My Mind
overview: Suppose you could take a peek into the mind of Chonda Pierce - comedy's "Queen of Clean!" Chances are you'd get a glimpse of the stuff most other women think about too - shopping, dieting, raising kids, breastfeeding and menopause! If you think you can handle it, Chonda is ready and willing to give you a piece of her mind.
title: Chonda Pierce - A Piece Of My Mind
